content: 2 until you have 36 44 48 sts on your needles repeat round 1 until you have 20 24 28 sts on your needles arrange your stitches so that the first 10 12 14 sts are on one needle and the last 10 12 14 sts are on another needle graft toe closed with kitchener stitch weave in all ends and wet block the sock to relax the stitches this is the end of clue four you can now make a second sock i hope you enjoyed travelling this path of discovery with me thank you for knitting my socks j copyright robin e johnston 2025 10 heritage surprise copyright robin e johnston 2025 11 heritage surprise copyright robin e johnston 2025 12 heritage surprise copyright robin e johnston 2025 13
